helm-values.affinity.description:
Kubernetes affinity: constraints for pod assignment.

For example:
affinity:
  nodeAffinity:
   requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
     nodeSelectorTerms:
     - matchExpressions:
       - key: foo.bar.com/role
         operator: In
         values:
         - master

helm-values.app.approver.metrics.port.description: Port for exposing Prometheus metrics on 0.0.0.0 on path '/metrics'.

helm-values.app.approver.metrics.service.description: Create a Service resource to expose metrics endpoint.
Create Prometheus ServiceMonitor resource for cert-manager-csi-driver-spiffe approver.
The interval that the Prometheus will scrape for metrics.
Additional labels to give the ServiceMonitor resource.
The value for the "prometheus" label on the ServiceMonitor. This allows for multiple Prometheus instances selecting difference ServiceMonitors using label selectors.
The timeout on each metric probe request.

helm-values.app.approver.readinessProbe..description: Container port to expose csi-driver-spiffe-approver HTTP readiness probe on default network interface.

helm-values.app.approver.replicaCount.description: Number of replicas of the approver to run.

helm-values.app.approver.resources.description:
Kubernetes pod resource limits for cert-manager-csi-driver-spiffe approver

For example:
resources:
  limits:
    cpu: 100m
    memory: 128Mi
  requests:
    cpu: 100m
    memory: 128Mi

helm-values.app.approver.signerName.description: A signer name that the csi-driver-spiffe approver will be given permission to approve and deny. CertificateRequests referencing this signer name can be processed by the SPIFFE approver. See: https://cert-manager.io/docs/concepts/certificaterequest/#approval. Defaults to empty which allows approval for all signers

helm-values.app.driver.csiDataDir.description: Configures the hostPath directory that the driver will write and mount volumes from.

helm-values.app.driver.livenessProbe.por.description: The port that will expose the liveness of the csi-driver

helm-values.app.driver.livenessProbeImag.description:
Target image digest. Override any tag, if set.
For example:
digest: sha256:0e072dddd1f7f8fc8909a2ca6f65e76c5f0d2fcfb8be47935ae3457e8bbceb20

Target image registry. This value is prepended to the target image repository, if set.
For example:
registry: registry.k8s.io
repository: sig-storage/livenessprobe
Override the image tag to deploy by setting this variable. If no value is set, the chart's appVersion is used.

helm-values.app.driver.nodeDriverRegistr.description:
Target image digest. Override any tag, if set.
For example:
digest: sha256:0e072dddd1f7f8fc8909a2ca6f65e76c5f0d2fcfb8be47935ae3457e8bbceb20

Target image registry. This value is prepended to the target image repository, if set.
For example:
registry: registry.k8s.io
repository: sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar
Override the image tag to deploy by setting this variable. If no value is set, the chart's appVersion is used.

helm-values.app.driver.resources.description:
Kubernetes pod resource limits for cert-manager-csi-driver-spiffe

For example:
resources:
  limits:
    cpu: 100m
    memory: 128Mi
  requests:
    cpu: 100m
    memory: 128Mi

helm-values.app.driver.sourceCABundle.description: Optional file containing a CA bundle that will be propagated to managed volumes.

helm-values.app.driver.volumeFileName.ca.description: File name where the CA bundles are written to, if enabled.

helm-values.app.driver.volumeFileName.ce.description: File name which signed certificates are written to in volumes.

helm-values.app.driver.volumeFileName.ke.description: File name which private keys are written to in volumes.

helm-values.app.driver.volumeMounts.description:
Optional extra volume mounts. Useful for mounting root CAs

For example:
volumeMounts:
- name: root-cas
  mountPath: /var/run/secrets/cert-manager-csi-driver-spiffe

helm-values.app.driver.volumes.description:
Optional extra volumes. Useful for mounting root CAs

For example:
volumes:
- name: root-cas
  secret:
    secretName: root-ca-bundle

helm-values.app.extraCertificateRequestA.description:
List of annotations to add to certificate requests

For example:
extraCertificateRequestAnnotations: app=csi-driver-spiffe,foo=bar

helm-values.app.issuer.group.description: Issuer group which is used to serve this Trust Domain.

helm-values.app.issuer.kind.description: Issuer kind which is used to serve this Trust Domain.

helm-values.app.issuer.name.description: Issuer name which is used to serve this Trust Domain.

helm-values.app.name.description: The name for the CSI driver installation.

helm-values.app.runtimeIssuanceConfigMap.description:
Name of a ConfigMap in the installation namespace to watch, providing runtime configuration of an issuer to use.

The "issuer-name", "issuer-kind" and "issuer-group" keys must be present in the ConfigMap for it to be used.

helm-values.app.trustDomain.description: The Trust Domain for this driver.

helm-values.commonLabels.description: Labels to apply to all resources

helm-values.image.digest.approver.description:
Target csi-driver approver digest. Override any tag, if set.
For example:
approver: sha256:0e072dddd1f7f8fc8909a2ca6f65e76c5f0d2fcfb8be47935ae3457e8bbceb20

helm-values.image.digest.driver.description:
Target csi-driver driver digest. Override any tag, if set.
For example:
driver: sha256:0e072dddd1f7f8fc8909a2ca6f65e76c5f0d2fcfb8be47935ae3457e8bbceb20

helm-values.image.registry.description:
Target image registry. This value is prepended to the target image repository, if set.
For example:
registry: quay.io
repository:
  driver: jetstack/cert-manager-csi-driver-spiffe
  approver: jetstack/cert-manager-csi-driver-spiffe-approver

helm-values.image.repository.approver.description: Target image repository for the csi-driver approver Deployment.

helm-values.image.repository.driver.description: Target image repository for the csi-driver driver DaemonSet.

helm-values.image.tag.description: Override the image tag to deploy by setting this variable. If no value is set, the chart's appVersion is used.

helm-values.imagePullSecrets.description:
Optional secrets used for pulling the csi-driver-spiffe and csi-driver-spiffe-approver container images

For example:
imagePullSecrets:
- name: secret-name

helm-values.nodeSelector.description: Kubernetes node selector: node labels for pod assignment.

helm-values.openshift.securityContextCon.description:
Include RBAC to allow the DaemonSet to "use" the specified
SecurityContextConstraints.

This value can either be a boolean true or false, or the string "detect". If set to "detect" then the securityContextConstraint is automatically enabled for openshift installs.
Name of the SecurityContextConstraints to create RBAC for.

helm-values.priorityClassName.description: Optional priority class to be used for the csi-driver pods.

helm-values.tolerations.description:
Kubernetes pod tolerations for cert-manager-csi-driver-spiffe.

For example:
tolerations:
- key: foo.bar.com/role
  operator: Equal
  value: master
  effect: NoSchedule

helm-values.topologySpreadConstraints.description:
List of Kubernetes TopologySpreadConstraints.

For example:
topologySpreadConstraints:
- maxSkew: 2
  topologyKey: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
  whenUnsatisfiable: ScheduleAnyway
  labelSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: cert-manager
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
